description: This file defines placeholder API functions for a notes management application, intended to be replaced with real backend fetch calls in the future.

methods.name: listNotes$
methods.description: Placeholder function to list notes; currently returns an empty array.

methods.name: createNote$
methods.description: Placeholder function to create a new note; currently returns a success object.

methods.name: updateNote$
methods.description: Placeholder function to update an existing note; currently returns a success object.

methods.name: deleteNote$
methods.description: Placeholder function to delete a note; currently returns a success object.

ctags.name: createNote$
ctags.pattern: /^export const createNote$ = $(async (_note: { title: string; content: string }) => {$/

ctags.name: updateNote$
ctags.pattern: /^export const updateNote$ = $(async (_id: string, _note: { title: string; content: string }) => {$/
